column1: 2012: Lego: The Lord of the Rings:

:Bombadil is a playable character.  He uses a trowel as a weapon and for digging in certain spots. Tom can be found in his house on the road to the north of Bucklebury Ferry in the forested area between Bree and the Shire. It is unclear if this forest is meant to be the Old Forest or not; it is in the right location
column2: but the game never specifically names it and its physical appearance does not fit the books description.
